DataElement.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Weight Performance Status Collection Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator relating to information regarding the act of gathering the weight and measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities of a patient for a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Surgical Procedure Weight Performance Status Collection
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the act of gathering the weight and measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities of a patient for a diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Used for operative procedures on organs, regions, or tissues in the treatment of diseases, including tissue section by lasers. It excludes transplantation, for which "transplantation" is used.

Concepts.definition: A diagnostic or treatment procedure performed by manual and/or instrumental means, often involving an incision and the removal or replacement of a diseased organ or tissue; of or relating to or involving or used in surgery or requiring or amenable to treatment by surgery.

Property.preferredDefinition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.:A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.:The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

Concepts.definition: The vertical force exerted by a mass as a result of gravity.
A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.
The act of gathering things together; having been brought together in one place.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: released as part of draft content review;SD 12/21/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
